name: Gold Perforated Aluminum Sheet | Radiator Sheet | Lincane Design | 24 x 36 inches | .020” Thick | Great for Indoor & Outdoor Use | Made in The USA
short_description: ALUMINUM SHEET –36" x 24" Gold Lincane Design Aluminum Sheet. .020" Thick.

LINCANE DESIGN – Lincane is a type of perforated metal pattern featuring small, staggered shaped holes. It is commonly used for decorative and functional purposes, such as ventilation, screening, and aesthetic appeal. The design allows for airflow and visibility while providing a level of privacy and security. Lincane patterns are often found in architectural panels, cabinet inserts, radiator covers, and industrial applications.

DIMENSIONS – This aluminum sheet is 24 x 36 inches and is .020 inches thick. While it is made to be a specific length and width, this sheet can also be cut to fit its desired area. All you would need is your snipping tool of choice.

INDOOR/OUTDOOR USE – With its easy installation, these sheets can be used indoors or outdoors. Simply attach the sheet to the other material you are using with sheet metal screws or rivets. This product functions as a perfect Radiator Sheet!

MADE IN AMERICA - Since 1955, we have manufactured American-made, high-quality home and commercial improvement products. Inspired by the latest trends and technology, our extensive line fits seamlessly and works efficiently on any job site.
